name: jquery-block_ellipsis
description: This jQuery plugin truncates a list of inline-blocks to a certain amount of lines with an optional show more/less. Responsive-ready.
author: Algolia

scripts.build: browserify src/block_ellipsis.js -o dist/jquery-block_ellipsis.js && cd dist && uglifyjs jquery-block_ellipsis.js -o jquery-block_ellipsis.min.js --mangle --compress --source-map jquery-block_ellipsis.min.js.map && cd ..
